verses.name: 2 Chronicles 26:1
verses.text: Then all the people of Judah took Uzziah, who was sixteen years old, and made him king in the room of his father Amaziah.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 26:2
verses.text: He built Eloth, and restored it to Judah, after that the king slept with his fathers.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 26:3
verses.text: Sixteen years old was Uzziah when he began to reign, and he reigned fifty and two years in Jerusalem. His mother’s name also was Jecoliah of Jerusalem.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 26:4
verses.text: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord, according to all that his father Amaziah did.
